member.summary: A Constructor setting all Properties as given in . Key values have to specify the name of the Property ( "SentSeparator", "ReceivedSeparator", "InfoSeparator", "Comment", "TimeSpanTraceFormat", "TimeStampTraceFormat" or "TimeStampFileFormat") which will be set to their corresponding values.
member.param: A Collection of KeyValuePairs in which Key values have to specify the name of the Property ( "SentSeparator", "ReceivedSeparator", "InfoSeparator", "Comment", "TimeSpanTraceFormat", "TimeStampTraceFormat" or "TimeStampFileFormat") which will be set to their corresponding values.
